title: Teen suicide
creator_credit: Cambridge Research Group Limited, Charlotte Angel, Kyle Boyd and Matt Clark
brief_description: This program looks at the reasons troubled teenagers consider, attempt or commit suicide. There is an emphasis on recognising the warning signs, the importance of communication, preventative measures and where to go to help. The program features interviews with teenagers who offer insights into the reasons why they felt suicidal and how they dealt with their situations.
